name: Pixel Cat Match-3
description:
This is my submission for the Mini Jam 80: Cats, done in a day. 

The theme was cats, and the limitation was 8x8px tiles or smaller. I have used the following Match-3 tutorial as a starting point, set up my Unity project for 2D pixel art using this tutorial, downloaded the Thaleah_PixelFont from the Unity asset store to use for text, and created custom pixel art assets in Photoshop to replace the tutorial art.
